texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Yonagi is having her meal right now.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Your food is ready as well.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Apace. No problems detected thus far.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: The regression isn't as severe as expected, though it is still within the margin of error.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: She'll probably ask me to play with her again.
After playing until she's exhausted, Yonagi takes a shower and falls asleep like a log.
If the progression of the first dream is anything to go by...
In the dream that's about to come, we'll be separated once again.
I lay down and try resist the drowsiness, but the soothing warmth of the room and the scent of cedar make short work of my fading consciousness.
